hadiths.text: On being asked about (washing) the fluid that flows between man and woman ‘A’ishah said:The Messenger of Allah (May peace be upon him) used to take a handful of water and pour it on the fluid. Again, he would take a handful of water and pour it over the fluid

chapter.ara-name: باب فِيمَا يَفِيضُ بَيْنَ الرَّجُلِ وَالْمَرْأَةِ مِنَ الْمَاءِ
chapter.eng-name: The Fluid That Flows Between The Man And The Woman (And Traces Remain On One's Garment Or Body)
